title: can we have a better end of game statistics screen?
body:
I want to be able to see damage shielded, to differentiate between self heals and ally heals in post game
damage mitigated (through stuff like armor)
Amount of time spent under the effects of cc, the amount of time you have had enemies locked down. (both showing the exact cc)
amount of distance moved, (showing specifics based on dashes blinks or forced movements.)
Also it would be nice to see a stat for lethal damage (It would only count damage that was not regenerated before the target either backs or dies)

replies.body: if they put something like effective health per fight and saw something like adcs haveing the same effective health as  a tank due to lifesteal i think that would cause some problems that people would have wanted to pretend dont currently exist
even so, I would love to see those statistics.
